com.github.zhengframework.validator.aop

Class ValidationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.zhengframework.validator.aop.ValidationContext

  • @Singleton
public class ValidationContext
extends Object
    Defines validation groups used by method validation. Actual groups are defined with ValidationGroups annotation.

    Context is thread bound.

    Inline contexts inherit all groups from upper levels.

    Default group is implicitly appended if allowed by module configuration (default true).

    Groups may be defined directly (without annotations usage) by using doWithGroups(GroupAction, Class[]).

    Since:
    07.03.2016
    Author:
    Vyacheslav Rusakov

    • Method Detail

      • getContextGroups

        public Class<?>[] getContextGroups()
        Returns:
        current context validation groups or empty array when no groups defined

      • doWithGroups

        public <T> T doWithGroups(GroupAction<T> action,
                          Class<?>... groups)
        Defines context validation groups. Context is defined for all logic inside action callback (in current thread). Note: does not override current context groups.
        Type Parameters:
        T - action return type
        Parameters:
        action - action callback to be executed with validation groups
        groups - validation groups to use
        Returns:
        object produced by action callback

        private void pushContext(Class<?>[] groups)
